name: Craig Graham
title: User Experience Engineer

quickfacts.title: Cereal Fanatic
quickfacts.caption: Has the diet of a 5 year old, Cereal and PB&J's

quickfacts.title: Simple Sheep Farmer
quickfacts.caption: Grew up on a 4-H farm

quickfacts.title: DIY'er Extraordinaire
quickfacts.caption: Or so he thinks he is

quickfacts.title: Running Man
quickfacts.caption: Qualified for and ran the Boston Marathon

tagline: Craig is the one of Innovation Studio's resident designer/frontend developers - his user-centered approach to design leads to effective and delightful solutions

abilities.title: Web Design
abilities.blurb: I have been developing and designing for the web for the last five years.  Headphones on and a dry-ease marker in hand, frantically scribbling away is my at-work happy place. It is a personal victory whenever I am able delight someone with the unexpected when they interact with the interfaces I create.

abilities.title: User Research
abilities.blurb: Hard problems are the best! I love the complex challenges of conducting, analyzing and reporting user research. User Centered Design is a huge passion of mine and I can't think of a more vital part of UCD than accurate user research.

abilities.title: Visual Design
abilities.blurb: Ever since High School I have been obsessed with visual design.  This has translated into a quest to use fantastic visual design to aid in the creation of effective user experiences.

abilities.title: Child Rearing
abilities.score: (In Progress, No Sound Data at This Time)
abilities.blurb: I am a foster father to an awesome infant who inspires me everyday to always observe and learn from the world around me (wow that was cheesy)
